page.content: Pain Management Print Sections Basic Facts Causes Symptoms Diagnosis & Tests Care & Treatment Lifestyle & Management Lifestyle & Management Staying Active Staying involved in physical and social activities is important and will reduce the risk of depression and isolation. Maintaining a Good Diet Having a good diet will help improve the way drugs work, help reduce their side effects, and help to maintain the energy needed for daily activities.
